meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or containing the nitroso group (NO)
meanings.sent1: The nitroso compound had a distinct smell.
meanings.sent2: Her experiment involved the use of a nitroso solution.
meanings.sent3: The nitroso chemicals decided to have a party in the lab.
meanings.sent4: The sky turned a nitroso hue as the storm approached.
meanings.sent5: The nitroso properties of the substance made it highly reactive.

meanings.definition: A compound containing the nitroso group
meanings.sent1: The scientist synthesized a new nitroso for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The nitroso in the test tube changed color upon heating.
meanings.sent3: The nitroso in the beaker seemed to be dancing under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: The garden was filled with the fragrance of nitroso after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The nitroso was the key component in the chemical reaction.
